modStringsEN: Aim: To get four symbols in a row

Method:
Choose a square and click on it. Click on the matching words in the box that appears. If you are right the picture is replaced by an X. Continue until you have won four squares in a row.
Click on 'PLAY' to play, or change topic with the 'Change Topic' button
Loaded music, going to play page
Click a picture - select the matching words to win that square
...now click the words that match the picture
Choose a picture by clicking on it...
Click on the words that match the picture
Well done, you have completed the game. Click on a button above to continue.
